Title: A Ghastly Legacy
Description:
We need to give these creatures peace.

While you are down there assisting Voraxian, please end their suffering. Even a temporary release from this existence will help relieve their burden. In the meantime, Narvra can work on her ritual.
ObjectivesText: Eliminate 10 Ghostly Researchers and Failed Experiments in the Acidbite Ravine.

Objectives.Text: Failed Experiments or Ghostly Researchers slain
